name: Red dust
description:
Red dust - hardcore first person shooter with randomly generated world.
Game was created under the inspiration of "Receiver".

Get to the center of station and take control of it.Move slowly, don`t lower guard. Mistakes are expensive. Collect ammo, body details, and red dust - energy resource, which can repair your glass body, this is your health in this world.

Key Features
-random generated world 1 km x 1 km
-different types of cartridges
-guns with unique features and different characteristics
-detailed guns mechanic
-different types of aims
